attributes.action: advise people to switch off internet explorer due to critical vulnerabilities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
hello,

Currently the French And German Goverment have advised people to stop using internet explorer due to critical vulnerablities within this browser.

This petition is for our goverment to take the same stance as the french and german govermnet. much to the rejoice all over the land of every web developer. 

Old versions of internet explorer are also holding up development of our web infrastructure as a whole.

http://www.sophos.com/blogs/gc/g/2010/01/18/french-government

http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/technology/8463516.stm

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
